title: Not Taking Smite
body:
Now in the Pre-season I often find myself fixing up rune pages in the pregame lobby and getting myself ready for the match. So much so that when I get placed in an off-role like jungle I forget smite. I'm just too busy messing around with my rune pages to notice that anything's wrong. I know this is really my fault, but some kind of ping or warning to say "you've forgotten smite" in ranked would save me a lot of hardship.

Thanks, Rory.

replies.body: or at least if they are forcing junglers who accidentally forget smite to not buy the jungle items, force the jungle role to take smite. would solve the problem.
Yeah, Because without smite there's no way to get through the jungle. You die quickly and you can't keep up in xp.
